mapper.select: SELECT r.room_code ,r.ldg_code ,r.room_name ,r.room_explain ,r.room_personnel ,r.room_type ,r.room_checkin ,r.room_price ,r.room_discount ,r.room_final_price ,f.file_path ,l.ldg_name FROM tb_room_info AS r LEFT JOIN tb_file_control AS fc ON r.ldg_code = fc.reference_code LEFT JOIN tb_file AS f ON fc.file_idx = f.file_idx INNER JOIN tb_ldg_information AS l ON r.ldg_code = l.ldg_code;
